meta.description: Discover how opioid addiction affects the brain and how treatments are saving lives.

title: NOVA | Addiction | Season 45 | Episode 12 | PBS
cleaned_text: Hear firsthand from individuals struggling with addiction and follow the cutting-edge work of doctors and scientists as they investigate why addiction is not a moral failing, but a chronic, treatable medical condition. Easy access to drugs like heroin, fentanyl, and even prescription medications like OxyContin has fueled an epidemic of addiction—the deadliest in U.S. history.
